column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/406b1f05f61a7bba7ef6860c031a7a7c3e019100 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK (untested, but it's just a revert)\n
I guess we should add a test to prevent this from happening in the future.\n
Do we have any way to test RPC in the current codebase?\n
Well, there is rpc_tests: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/test/rpc_tests.cpp \nBut there is nothing that tests the JSON parsing / formatting explicitly.\n
